Features.title: User Authentication and Profiles
Features.text: Secure registration and login system, allowing users to create and customize profiles, manage account settings, and track their gaming history and achievements.

Features.title: Multiplayer Gaming
Features.text: Real-time multiplayer poker tables where users can join or create games, invite friends, and play against other players. Support for various poker variants such as Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and more.

Features.title: In-Game Chat and Social Features
Features.text: Integrated chat system for players to communicate during games, along with social features like friend lists, private messaging, and the ability to create or join clubs or tournaments.

Features.title: In-Game Chip Management
Features.text: Advanced chip management system that automatically handles chip distribution, betting. This ensures fair play and smooth game flow, allowing players to focus on their strategies and gameplay
